body_html:
No such file or directory

This is a simple error: weight loading can't find the cached file for this model.

Your code snippet does work for me, so nothing wrong with the file location in tf.keras. I assume there was an issue when keras downloaded the file locally for you.

Try deleting ~/.keras/models/. Maybe that will fix it.
body_text:
No such file or directory

This is a simple error: weight loading can't find the cached file for this model.
Your code snippet does work for me, so nothing wrong with the file location in tf.keras. I assume there was an issue when keras downloaded the file locally for you.
Try deleting ~/.keras/models/. Maybe that will fix it.
body:
> No such file or directory

This is a simple error: weight loading can't find the cached file for this model.

Your code snippet does work for me, so nothing wrong with the file location in tf.keras. I assume there was an issue when keras downloaded the file locally for you.

Try deleting `~/.keras/models/`. Maybe that will fix it.
